title: Hoher Kasten
text:
The Hoher Kasten is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in the <a href="Appenzell%20Alps">Appenzell Alps</a>, overlooking the <a href="Rhine">Rhine</a> in Eastern <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>. It is located on the border between the cantons of <a href="Appenzell%20Innerrhoden">Appenzell Innerrhoden</a> and <a href="Canton%20of%20St.%20Gallen">St. Gallen</a>.
The summit is easily accessible with a cable car starting at Brülisau, south of <a href="Appenzell%20%28town%29">Appenzell</a>. A <a href="revolving%20restaurant">revolving restaurant</a>, offering panoramic views, has been built on the top.
Ascents to Hoher Kasten and the neighouring summit <a href="Kamor">Kamor</a> were already described in the early 19th century.
